original_text: Some Pharisees came to talk to Jesus. They wanted to see how he would answer their question. They asked, ‘Can a man send his wife away so that she is no longer his wife? Is it right for him to do that for any reason he chooses?’
korean_text: 바리새인들이 예수께 나아와 그를 시험하여 이르되 사람이 어떤 이유가 있으면 그 아내를 버리는 것이 옳으니이까

sentences.original_text: Some Pharisees came to talk to Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 몇몇 바리새인들이 예수님과 대화하기 위해 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They wanted to see how he would answer their question.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수님이 어떻게 그들의 질문에 대답할지 보고 싶어했습니다.

sentences.original_text: 'Can a man send his wife away
so that she is no longer his wife?'
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 더 이상 그의 아내가 아니게 하기 위해요?'
